Index.subtitle: Fada Mohammed Hila Al Otaibi Est.
Index.title: Innovative Technology Solutions for Ports & Logistics
Index.description: Burj Al Najoom Technology is a leading agency providing cutting-edge software and hardware solutions, specializing in port and logistics management to streamline operations and enhance efficiency.

software.title: Software Solutions
software.portLogisticsAppDescription: Advanced software for managing port operations, including container tracking, scheduling, and logistics coordination.
software.shippingAppDescription: A specialized app for non-vessel operating common carriers, ensuring seamless shipping operations in Saudi Arabia.
software.customWebDevDescription: Tailored web applications to meet your business needs, from e-commerce to enterprise solutions.
software.customMobileDevDescription: Bespoke mobile apps for iOS and Android, designed for performance and user experience.
software.inventoryManagementDescription: A comprehensive system to track and manage inventory across multiple locations.
software.vesselTrackingDescription: Real-time tracking of vessels to optimize shipping routes and schedules.
software.warehouseAutomationDescription: Automate warehouse operations with smart software for picking, packing, and shipping.
software.freightForwardingDescription: A platform to manage freight forwarding operations, including documentation and tracking.
software.supplyChainAnalyticsDescription: Analyze supply chain data to improve efficiency and reduce costs.

hardware.title: Hardware & Networking
hardware.barcodePrintersDescription: We provide sales and services for all barcode and thermal printers, including Zebra, Epson, Bixolon, and more. Services include thermal printing solutions (direct thermal and thermal transfer), label customization, maintenance and repairs, software integration support, consumables management, and training to ensure efficiency and accuracy in inventory and logistics management.
hardware.idCardPrintersDescription: We offer sales and services for all ID card printers, including Evolis, Zebra, ID Smart, Fargo, and more. Services include printing single or dual-sided cards with variable data (photos, names, barcodes, RFID chips), customization, maintenance, integration with attendance or access control systems, consumables supply, and training to produce secure and professional ID cards.
hardware.networkPrinters: Installation of New Printers, Plotters & Photocopiers in Network
hardware.networkPrintersDescription: We offer installation services for new network printers, plotters, and photocopiers to ensure seamless operation. Services include assessing requirements, physical installation, configuring IP addresses, installing drivers, integrating with existing systems, testing performance, setting up user permissions, and providing training to enhance efficiency and productivity.
hardware.photocopiersDescription: Reliable photocopiers for high-volume document reproduction.
hardware.networkingDescription: We provide network IP troubleshooting services to ensure seamless connectivity between devices. Services include verifying physical connections, checking IP configurations, testing connectivity, resolving IP conflicts, resetting network settings, testing DNS settings, and optimizing network performance for stability and efficiency.
hardware.infrastructureDescription: We provide Dell server assembling and configuration services to ensure optimal performance and scalability. Services include selecting the appropriate model, installing components (CPUs, RAM, storage drives, RAID controllers), updating firmware, configuring RAID, installing operating systems, setting up networks, deploying applications, and testing for stability and efficiency.
hardware.upsInstallationDescription: We offer server UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply) installation services to ensure continuous operation and protect data from power outages. Services include selecting the appropriate UPS, electrical connections, integration with monitoring software, testing, and maintenance planning for reliability.
hardware.rfidReadersDescription: Advanced RFID readers for tracking assets and inventory in real-time.
hardware.portScannersDescription: High-speed scanners for port operations, ensuring accurate cargo documentation.
hardware.logisticsTerminalsDescription: Rugged terminals for logistics operations, designed for harsh environments.

Index.aboutDescription: Burj Al Najoom Technology is a premier technology agency based in Jeddah, dedicated to delivering innovative software and hardware solutions. With a focus on port and logistics management, we empower businesses to optimize their operations through advanced technology, seamless integration, and reliable support.
Index.missionDescription: Our mission is to revolutionize the port and logistics industry by providing state-of-the-art software and hardware solutions, ensuring efficiency, reliability, and scalability for our clients worldwide.

Metadata.title: Burj Al Najoom Technology - Port & Logistics Solutions
